channel.title: Media Page!
channel.description:
[ul]I will be launching a media page with download speeds of at least 1 MegaByte per second!
Please use Ctrl+F to search for an item.
[b][u]Movies:[/u][/b][list] [list] [li]Family Guy - It's A Trap([url=http://d99e1574.yyv.co]http://d99e1574.yyv.co[/url])[/li] [li]Talladega Nights - The Tale of Ricky Bobby(http://8144865a.yyv.co)[/li] [li]Reno 911 - Miami(http://26ca70cf.yyv.co)[/li] [li]The A-Team(http://1af24947.yyv.co)[/li] [li]The Last Airbender(http://b30de124.yyv.co)[/li] [li]The Other Guys(http://39fd3745.yyv.co)[/li] [li]The Social Network(http://590ee831.yyv.co)[/li] [li]The Town(http://1b8a969f.yyv.co)[/li] [li]No Strings Attatched(http://cbef544a.yyv.co)[/li] [li]No Country for Old Men(http://84fcf1ca.yyv.co)[/li][/list] [u][b]Music:[/b][/u] [list] [li]Eminem 1995-2011(http://666fa2ef.yyv.co)[/li] [/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Media Page!
item.dc:creator: @mcbeans mcbeans
item.description:
@mcbeans wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:43, topic:409034”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=510317.msg3704344#msg3704344 date=1312938610]

But they’re not making money off of it

uhh, as in? fox makes money off of the ratings cause family guy is tv. Fox makes money off of it’s movies because people pay for them at the theaters. DVDs and such are just there for extra revenue considering back in the 1960’s - 1980’s there really wasn’t any other way to make money than put it in the theater. So you do understand it when people don’t pay to see a movie they payed to see at the movies. Companies like fox are so bloated with stupid marketing campaigns that they lose sight of where their money goes, and to increase profit they sue people like me over this shit. If they wanted movies to be un-ripable or whatever then they should’ve made the DVDs incompatible with computers or locked them with an encrypted pass-phrase. It’s not that hard and i do it with my data every day.
[/quote]
So, you’re saying that because they make so much money, it’s okay to rip movies and make money off of them
okay[/quote]
no, i’m saying because they’re stupid enough to not encrypt their dvds… EDIT: or blurays

Read full topic

Companies like fox are so bloated with stupid marketing campaigns that they lose sight of where their money goes, and to increase profit they sue people like me over this shit. If they wanted movies to be un-ripable or whatever then they should’ve made the DVDs incompatible with computers or locked them with an encrypted pass-phrase. It’s not that hard and i do it with my data every day.[/quote]
So, you’re saying that because they make so much money, it’s okay to rip movies and make money off of them
okay

item.title: Media Page!

item.description:
@mcbeans wrote:

Cole1497:

But they’re not making money off of it

uhh, as in? fox makes money off of the ratings cause family guy is tv. Fox makes money off of it’s movies because people pay for them at the theaters. DVDs and such are just there for extra revenue considering back in the 1960’s - 1980’s there really wasn’t any other way to make money than put it in the theater. So you do understand it when people don’t pay to see a movie they payed to see at the movies. Companies like fox are so bloated with stupid marketing campaigns that they lose sight of where their money goes, and to increase profit they sue people like me over this shit. If they wanted movies to be un-ripable or whatever then they should’ve made the DVDs incompatible with computers or locked them with an encrypted pass-phrase. It’s not that hard and i do it with my data every day.

item.title: Media Page!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“mcbeans, post:36, topic:409034”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=510317.msg3704269#msg3704269 date=1312936369]

Here’s the deal, people should be allowed to post google (edit: someone changed my links***** into google) because you’re just sitting there on your lazy ass downloading while the uploaders have to do most of the work. If you like something, download it and wait 10 fucking seconds. Don’t be a bitch about it.

People need to stop bitching over little things like this.

Here’s the deal. He didn’t “work” for this, Seth Macfarlane and the rest of the creators of Family Guy did. And for him to make money off of it is not only wrong, but I’m pretty sure illegal, too.
[/quote]
your life must really suck (no offense…), but do you understand anyone can go on hulu or fox and watch this?[/quote]
Well considering both Fox and Hulu pay the creators of Family Guy (especially Fox, considering they own the rights to it)…

Read full topic

item.title: Media Page!
item.dc:creator: @mcbeans mcbeans
item.description:
@mcbeans wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:38, topic:409034”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=510317.msg3704300#msg3704300 date=1312937189]

Here’s the deal, people should be allowed to post google (edit: someone changed my links***** into google) because you’re just sitting there on your lazy ass downloading while the uploaders have to do most of the work. If you like something, download it and wait 10 fucking seconds. Don’t be a bitch about it.

People need to stop bitching over little things like this.

Here’s the deal. He didn’t “work” for this, Seth Macfarlane and the rest of the creators of Family Guy did. And for him to make money off of it is not only wrong, but I’m pretty sure illegal, too.

your life must really suck (no offense…), but do you understand anyone can go on hulu or fox and watch this?
[/quote]

I think you’ll find that Fox has the right to do what they want with it since it is produced for them, and Hulu is partially owned by Fox. This website is neither owned not endorsed by either.[/quote]
what i meant was that in fact users will be able to rip the episodes with real player anyways :o

Read full topic
